The interior of each villa is organized into two levels. On the ground floor, there is the main living area with large floor-to-ceiling windows, a well-equipped open space kitchen, and a welcoming dining area. The three bedrooms with en suite bathrooms are spread on the ground and first floors. The en-suite dressing room and walking closet add a touch of luxury and serve the modern needs for functionality and comfort. To make this project even more impressive, the exterior areas are dominated by the imposing spacious pool surrounded by sunbeds and sitting and dining areas that offer the feeling of enjoyment and relaxation throughout the day and the night.

property_title: Detached Villa FOR SALE in Paphos, Kouklia - Aphrodite Hills
property_description:
A very rare opportunity to acquire a stunning, spacious property situated in the Western Plateau of this world-renowned 5 Star Resort, within walking distance to the amenities. As you walk down the path in the midst of the beautiful terraced landscaped gardens and through the front door, there is an open plan living room and dining area with patio doors looking out onto the poolside terrace area, the pool and exquisite rear gardens. There is a modern kitchen with breakfast bar with a door leading to the drive and also a large understairs storeroom. The first double and twin bedrooms are both located on the ground floor level, are spacious and both have patio doors that open out to the outside terrace and garden. These bedrooms share a bathroom with a walk-in shower. Stairs lead to the lovely master bedroom suite which is a beautiful double aspect room with its own private balcony and en suite bathroom (with large walk in shower). There is also a large roof terrace which is accessed from the first floor landing that looks out down the ravine and sea in the distance. In the rear garden there is a lovely lawn with a seating area underneath a wooden pergola, benefitting from day-round sunshine because the garden is south-facing. There is an outside kitchen area with a pizza oven, sink and gas BBQ as well, together with a large covered verandah leading from the lounge and dining room.
The pool is 10m x 5m and is heated and also has a cover.
The Villa is fully air-conditioned and centrally heated for year around comfort and has the benefit of Photovoltaic panels.

property_description: The exclusive neighbourhoods and private homesites capitalise on incredible views, positioned around the golf course, children’s playgrounds and world-class amenities. Perched on a tranquil hilltop, resting in 5 million square metres of a Natura 2000 protected landscape, this authentic residential retreat offers true escapism and cultural discovery. Inspired by local Cypriot dwellings, the pioneering architecture is a unique balance of modernity, tradition and the natural world. High-quality design that creates a strong sense of community and long-term value has been an integral part of the shared vision between renowned developer and world-class architects, Woods Bagot. All properties – residences, villas and suites – harmonise with the topography to capture the light, harness cool hillside breezes and frame the extraordinary views. Nature is an ever-present element at Minthis. The 18-hole championship golf course moulds itself to the landscape, passing walnut and fig trees, olive groves and the historic 12th-century monastery.

property_description:
A contemporary 5-bedroom villa situated in Protaras coastal line just a few minutes walk to the beach and all near by amenities. Complex consists of six luxurious villas, all equipped with high standard facilities, modern spaces, high-end technology and quality interior.
Villas are set in three floors, a lower ground floor, a ground floor and a top floor, all equipped with high quality furniture and facilities. Each villa consists of five bedrooms and four bathrooms, a modern kitchen, sitting and dining room, covered verandas, outdoor jacuzzi, bar and grill area. They also offer a swimming pool, a Mediterranean style garden, and a covered parking area. In addition, you will find an exquisite security system with cameras and alarm system, satellite TV, sound system for all indoor and outdoor areas, central heating and air conditioning. Moreover, the villas are equipped with all the necessities to make your living more comfortable, offering you an upgraded lifestyle makes it the ideal place for people who want to escape in a safe, warm country that offers a luxury lifestyle,
Protaras has clear sky-blue waters and sandy beaches, the most well-known of which is Fig Tree Bay. It is a modern holiday resort of considerable size with hundreds of high capacity hotels, hotel apartments, villas, restaurants and pubs. Protaras has a reputation of catering more for family and Cypriot tourism. Cape Greco is a 10-minute drive from the center of Protaras, and is considered as one of the most beautiful places on the island.

It has an 8X10 m swimming pool, with built-in stairs and special anti-slip tiles. Adjacent to the swimming pool there is a 10X5 kiosk , a shower and w/c for the needs of the pool. In the back corner of the garden there is a shed (5X4) and a small gate for an easy beach access. There is a well for the need of the swimming pool and a water supply from the government dam for the needs of the garden.

Each suite features its own en-suite bathroom, with the master bedroom further enhanced by a private en-suite and access to a beautifully appointed balcony shared with the junior suite. A separate wardrobe area provides additional storage space. From the balcony, you can soak in breathtaking views of the azure Mediterranean Sea and the lush surrounding landscapes. The outdoor area is equally impressive, with a private swimming pool taking center stage, surrounded by various lounging and relaxation spaces that offer both sun and shade—ensuring the perfect spot for every moment of the day. A spacious BBQ area and beautifully landscaped gardens complete this idyllic retreat.

property_title: Detached Villa FOR SALE in Paphos, Konia
property_description:
This is a truly unique property, situated in an exclusive neighborhood in the sought after Konia village of Paphos, with beautiful sea & mountain views. This home is within a few minutes’ drive to Paphos Town, to the beach, to the International School of Paphos , easy access to the highway and generally within close proximity to all amenities and services. No expense has been spared in the renovation of this home using the best materials, luxury finishes and many extras. The property has a double garage with electric doors and a covered parking area. Upon entering you will be immediately greeted by the beautiful marble floor and the very spacious areas. You will find the large lounge area and the separate relaxation area with a fireplace, the separate kitchen and the dining area with all the latest appliances and granite worktops. You will also find a small lounge area and the breakfast table. On this level you will also find the laundry room, the guest cloakroom and the access to the garage area.
Taking the comfortable staircase to the 1st floor you will find the very spacious bedroom hall which takes you to the four bedrooms. The master bedroom is very spacious , offering walk in wardrobes , ensuite facilities, jacuzzi bath and a large balcony with sitting areas with beautiful sea and mountain views. You will also find the family bathroom with a bath and a shower. One of the 4 bedrooms is currently used as a study room. Taking the staircase to the lower ground floor you will find the 5th bedroom , the two bathrooms , the sauna, a lounge area and two storage rooms.
Stepping outside it will take your breath away . The property is built on a very large plot of 1,510 sq.m. with beautiful landscaped gardens, fruit trees, plenty of relaxation / sitting area , a large private swimming pool and a beautiful custom made BBQ area, plenty of shaded areas for al fresco dining and lounging and lots of entertainment areas.
The extras are too many to list , a list can be supplied upon request , some of the extras are : photovoltaic panels ( 7kw) , underfloor heating & radiators working with an electric heat pump and with diesel, ultraviolet pool system, water well etc….
The property has Title Deeds and the price includes furniture, fixtures & fittings
Konia village is located 3km East of Paphos on the South West coast of Cyprus and is conveniently close to both Paphos International Airport and Elea Golf and Country Club. Situated on a hill 190 metres above sea level, Konia enjoys panoramic views over the Paphos coastline. The village has a number of amenities including a mini market, bakery a couple of traditional tavernas, bank, coffee shop and is only a short drive from the private English speaking school.

property_description: Spacious 4 bedroom property for sale, with generous parking, sea and sunset views and stunning guest suite. This beautifully designed detached 4 bedroom villa in Aphrodite Hills is built in an elevated position on the Eastern Plateau and is laid out over two floors with stunning views over the resort down to the Mediterranean Sea. To the front of the villa is a sweeping block-paved driveway with ample parking space for a number of cars. Entrance to the villa is via hard wood double doors into the open plan living and dining area with immediate views through full glass double doors to the terrace and beyond. The property has full central heating throughout and an open fire in the living area. The kitchen is to the right of the main entrance and has recently been extended and updated to a very high standard. Also on this level are the master bedroom with en-suite and dressing area and a further two double bedrooms sharing a bathroom. All bedrooms are well proportioned with ample wardrobe space. The lower ground level of the villa is accessed via attractive stairs from the living/dining area. This level is dedicated to a further fourth double guest bedroom with its own shower room, kitchenette facilities and a private secluded patio. On this floor is a magnificent entertainment room with its own bar and pool table. Access to the garage on this level is provided via a separate driveway. The gardens and pool area are beautifully designed and maintained with plenty of space for relaxation and enjoyment and superb views to the Mediterranean Sea. The built-in barbecue is situated on the main external terrace and provides a focal point for entertainment. This four bedroomed detached villa has real character and is presented for sale in immaculate condition throughout. Designed for family or holiday living it is a property that can be enjoyed all year round and we recommend early viewing.

High-quality design that creates a strong sense of community and long-term value has been an integral part of the shared vision between renowned developer and world-class architects, Woods Bagot. property_title: Detached Villa FOR SALE in Paphos, Pegia - Coral Bay
property_description:
The drive down the cul-de-sac brings us to this airy property. Located right on the sea, this home boasts some of the most beautiful views and with less than a 5 minute walk to the heart of Coral Bay where you will find a wide selection of restaurants, cafes, and supermarkets this could only be the ideal coastal place. Upon entering you will be greeted by the hallway leading to the double bedroom and the guest cloakroom with a shower. An open plan living and dining area with fantastic sea views, a shaded outdoor dining area, and its own private pool. The fully equipped kitchen is separate from the living and dining areas. The stairs lead up to the two double bedrooms and the family bathroom. The views from the bedrooms and especially the balcony is to die for. From the same staircase we go to the lower ground level where there is another bedroom with a sitting area and an office. From there you have access to the garden from the private side door in the room. The outdoor area is out of this world. There is a covered dining area, pool and garden. Relax and indulge in the spectacular sea views directly from your door step and a few steps down you can go for a swim in the crystal clear waters of the Mediterranean Sea.
Coral Bay is a popular tourist resort in the Peyia municipality 6 km north of the city of Paphos. As the largest village in Paphos bordering Kathikas, Akoursos, Kissonerga and the Akamas Peninsular there is plenty to do including swimming at the renowned Blue Flag awarded Coral Bay Beach with its 600m crescent of soft white sand. With the abundance of amenities in the area Peyia (Coral Bay) caters for most needs. You will find a wide choice of restaurants, traditional taverns and bars to accommodate everyone.

property_title: Detached Villa FOR SALE in Paphos, Konia
property_description: The site sits at a unique location, 330 metres above sea level, and commands panoramic, unobstructed views of the coast that stretch from Pafos Airport (to the south-east) to Coral Bay (to the west) and the Tsada mountains to the north. The location enjoys a cooler microclimate than coastal Pafos with reduced humidity levels, due to its altitude and its natural environment. Despite its proximity to Pafos (a mere 5-minute drive to the town centre), the site enjoys a level of privacy and access to nature that is most often associated with more remote, mountainous locations. The residence is located to the northeast of Konia, and sits at an even higher altitude than the community. The residence enjoys direct and convenient access to neighbouring communities for local amenities such as bakeries, groceries, tavernas, and schools. The location also provides excellent access to the motorway directly from the roundabout at the entrance of Pafos. Therefore, it is easy to access the Paphos centre, the General Hospital, and the International Airport. There is a variety of activities to be enjoyed within a 10km radius. It consists of three levels, arranged to work with the topography for easy access, security, and sustainability. Its unique architecture is inspired by the site itself, and follows the architects’ aesthetic and environmental values to provide for a lifestyle that is at once luxurious and leisurely. The site is configured in such a way as to make the most of the sweeping views over Pafos, and at the same time utilise the topography and gradient to provide convenient and secure access. The placement of the residence allows a large garden to the front, and maintains a large part of the plot to the rear for additional landscaping to create a more private garden.

property_title: Detached Villa FOR SALE in Paphos, Kritou Tera
property_description: Nestled on the hillside outside of Kritou Terra, the house welcomes owners with a narrow passage adorned with flower pots, aromatic plants and the sounds from a trickling water fountain, setting a tone of warmth and serenity from your first step into this mountain paradise. The layout of the property is a masterful blend of functionality and beauty. Paved paths carved into the mountain stone and lined with fruit trees, aromatic plants, shrubs, and flowers lead visitors through the large terraced garden. This is a one of a kind estate for those wanting to get back to nature in style and comfort. Comprised of four levels and three houses, stone steps descend from the highest point of the property where the tower stands to the exquisitely designed lap pool on the second level. The third level is home to the main building— a three-story structure housing the master bedroom, living rooms, kitchen, dining area, bathrooms, guest room and service rooms. The fourth level is on the lower section of the property where the third building houses a large office, sun room, outdoor deck for afternoon cocktails and two guest bedrooms. The tower, standing 20 meters tall at the entrance, flanks the driveway, carport and garage and is the highest point of the property. It is a home to three bedrooms and two bathrooms with ancient imported Nepali doors and brass chandeliers evoking an atmosphere of peace in medieval times. A sitting room on the top floor offers spectacular views of the Mediterranean Sea and sand beaches between Polis and Pomos, a twenty-minute drive away. All rooms of the tower provide a secluded retreat, sweeping views of the surrounding countryside. Descending a series of stone stairs carved into the mountainside, you find the exquisitely designed swimming pool, nestled to the right offering a tranquil refuge to swim laps, rinse in a hidden outdoor shower and lounge under the tall pine trees within the calming aroma of rosemary, lavender and lemon verbena. Further down the winding stairs leads you to the main house on the third level. Upon entering the main house, the entrance hall serves as the central hub, connecting the various spaces of the ground floor. From here, you can walk toward the dining room and kitchen on one side, or the living room on the other. Indian furniture and Persian carpets fill the room with an exotic flair. Beneath the staircase leading to the master bedroom, a piano imported from Boston, Massachusetts graces the space, adding an air of elegance and old-world charm. French windows open from all rooms on this level onto a large terrace perfect for entertaining or hosting social gatherings. Beautiful greenish- grey slate tiles run throughout all rooms connecting spaces in a distinct harmony.

Nearby is the beautiful monastery of Ayios Neophytos.

Property offers mature green gardens, full size tennis court, private heated swimming pool all on 3952 m2 plot.

property_title: Detached Villa FOR SALE in Paphos, Polis
property_description: A unique county residence located high above Ayia Marina, a small but friendly village on the outskirts of Polis with picture perfect views over Paphos pine forest to the Chrysochous Bay. This stone built house has 3 bedrooms all ensuite and is on a plot of 7,900 sqm. There is an Infinity swimming pool with the most amazing views, stone buildings suitable for riding stables, etc and provision for two tennis courts. As you drive through the electric gateway to the massive driveway take a moment to fully appreciate the stunning location of this property, being next to the Paphos Pine Forest but having unique Panoramic views of the mountains and the sea beyond. The front door leads into the entrance hallway, and to the left are the guest toilets and downstairs bedroom. This is a spacious double bedroom with of patio doors leading out onto the pool area, built in wardrobes, a/c and ceiling fans and an ensuite bathroom. To the right of the front door is the is the open plan lounge / dining / kitchen area. Upstairs on the landing there is a kitchenette with sink, fridge and wine cooler and access to the remaining bedrooms and access to the veranda. The master bedroom has an ensuite bathroom with a corner Jacuzzi Bath. Patio doors lead out onto a large terrace of 48sqm where you can relax and watch the whole of the local countryside and the sea in the Chrysochou Bay. To complete the upstairs area is another double bedroom together with an ensuite bathroom. This bedroom has two balconies, one with views down to the sea and other towards the mountains. The plot is set over 2 areas - the upper area where the house is has an 12 x 5 m infinity pool and maintenance gardens, car port, large covered outside kitchen, bar and BBQ area, as well as a Utility room for storage and washing machines. Below the house is a large grassed area which can easily accommodate two tennis courts, and below this at the bottom of the property, is an area presently designed as stables for horses. These stables are stone built and on a large separate plot. these stables could easily be converted into art studios etc or used as a separate office area. There is a separate entrance to this area, through double iron gates.

A beautiful 4-bedroom detached villa with a contemporary design giving it a modern yet warm feel, is located in Agios Athanasios
The villa has a very convenient location with easy access to the highway and is very close to Grammar school, Mediterranean hospital, Alpha Mega and Lidl supermarkets, and mini football. A family house built with high-quality materials with great attention to detail. The property is outstanding in many ways. The villa is split over 2 floors with an internal covered area of 149 sqm. Another plus is that the villa has a dedicated laundry room just off the kitchen and there is one storage room indoors as well as outdoors.   Upstairs, you will find 4 bedrooms, one of them currently being used as an office space. There are another 2 bathrooms on this level also. The master bedroom has an en-suite with a shower and there is a family bathroom with a bath. The villa is fully air-conditioned, has central heating, is fully furnished, and comes with a title deed. Outdoors, the plot totals 381 sqm. There is space for a pool in the garden, just in front of the seating area with a pergola where there is a BBQ area too. There is also an extra room which has been built in the garden which is currently used as another workspace and storage. An electric gate leads you to your very own private parking space, one is covered and the other is uncovered. Veranda with wooden pergola and outdoor furniture facing the garden, next to custom made motorized barbecue with sink and storage. Beautiful garden with tall palm trees and Mediterranean plants and flowers.

All planning approvals were completed and approved by the relevant authorities.

The development offers a collection of bespoke Residences, Villas, and Suites, each thoughtfully designed to capture natural light and frame extraordinary views, while harnessing the cool hillside breezes. property_title: Detached Villa FOR SALE in Limassol, Limassol Marina
property_description: An elegant 3 bedroom villa with a private swimming pool in Limassol Marina. A unique property with a private boat deck - drive up to one door and sail away from another or simply step out onto the beach from your own garden. Enjoy living on the sea in an exclusive luxury villa with unobstructed views of the Mediterranean and the Marina. With the thrill of the city just moments away, you can relax in a beautiful setting, complete with your own private garden and swimming pool. This amazing villa is sold fully furnished and is ready to move in. It's been built on three levels. Moor your boat at the private deck, take a few steps and enter your new home. You are greeted by a beautiful tastefully decorated lounge area with a door leading to a covered veranda with amazing views. An open-plan dining area, a fully equipped kitchen plus a guest w/c and a storage room can also be found on the ground floor. There are two double ensuite bedrooms with built in wardrobes on the first floor. A master bedroom has a door opening to the veranda with a view of Marina and the sea. Enjoy falling asleep under a sound of waves and whispering of wind. A basement level consists of a spacious bedroom, a bathroom, a laundry and a huge storage space. Limassol Marina is an exciting destination in the Mediterranean. Designed by a world-renowned team of architects and engineers, it combines elegant residences and a full service marina with an enticing mix of restaurants and shops, to create a lifestyle uniquely shaped by `living on the sea’. On arrival, look no further than the Harbour Master for a well-rounded welcome and tips on discovering the destination. Limassol Marina’s Reception and Concierge Services can guide you on making the most of your stay, just steps away from your home, berth or further afield. The second largest city in Cyprus, Limassol is known as the town that never sleeps. It boasts a diverse international community and a rich calendar of events, against a backdrop of azure waters and clear blue skies.

property_title: Detached Villa FOR SALE in Paphos, Kouklia - Aphrodite Hills
property_description: An opportunity to acquire a stunning four bedroom villa with light, modern interiors and wonderful outdoor space which includes a private infinity edge pool and a pagoda that offers breathtaking views over neighbouring Secret Valley Golf Course. The outside space has recently been renovated and now boasts a brand new built-in BBQ area, a hot tub, and a wooden pagoda that stretches out of the garden, offering a really great space from which to enjoy sundowner drinks or chill-out time in the shade of the day. The views from the pool and the pagoda are some of the best on the resort, reaching right over the remarkable Secret Valley golf course out to sea. The surrounding area is very peaceful and there is a wonderful feeling of tranquillity as you soak up the views. These views are not lost inside; the bright, modern interiors also have large windows through which the views pour in. All four of the bedrooms are en-suite: three of the bedrooms are situated on the ground floor and one in the cooler basement level. The spacious master double bedroom has an ensuite with spa bath and overhead shower, as well as a walk-in shower unit. This room shares a balcony with the second double bedroom (which is en-suite with walk-in shower) on this level, overlooking Secret Valley. The third of the rooms on this level, the twin room, has a private balcony and en-suite bathroom with walk-in shower. Downstairs hosts the well equipped family kitchen, and beautiful dining area with stairs leading down to the large living space. The living area is a tall, open space with a real sociable feel. The patio doors that run the length of the living area open up to the upper outside terrace where there is comfortable seating and a dining table and chairs. The views from the terrace and living area are stunning. There is air-conditioning units and central heating. Downstairs, in the cooler basement level, you will find a lovely double room, which opens out to the lower terrace and lawn. This room also has an en-suite bathroom, with a walk-in shower.

Lavishly sized plots and beautifully landscaped gardens offer an outstanding degree of privacy and yet Aphrodite Hills' famous golf course is literally on your doorstep. Marble and parquet flooring, contemporary Italian style kitchens with Corian worktops, and marble bathrooms are complemented by those essentials for today’s lifestyle from provisions for under-floor heating, concealed air conditioning units, a discreet security system, automatic garden irrigation, a private pool, beautiful garden and more. The properties feature a 5m x 10m infinity edge swimming pool, high-quality Italian-style kitchens, and integrated, stainless steel finish appliances, along with Crema Tea Marble shower rooms and marble or parquet flooring throughout. Making an entrance through double doors, one enters a spacious hall offering a convenient guest cloakroom with a sweeping staircase leading to the first floor. Beyond this is a generously sized sitting room with panoramic glass doors opening out onto the veranda with captivating sea views and beautifully landscaped gardens with large terraces. A few steps to the left, the large dining room has its covered veranda and an open-plan kitchen, fully equipped with luxury appliances. The spacious and airy first-floor lobby leads to the magnificent master bedroom with panoramic glass doors opening onto a large terrace with unparalleled views of the Mediterranean and magnificent sunrise and sunset views over the horizon. The spacious en-suite bathroom has a real touch of luxury with a walk-in shower complete with an overhead rain shower and twin wash basins. Two further double bedrooms both offering spacious en-suite bathrooms complete the luxurious first-floor residence, with one of the bedrooms having access to the sea view terrace.

property_title: Detached Villa FOR SALE in Paphos, Tala
property_description:
A four-bedroom three-storey house with entry at the top level. The car entrance is from the road level, and a parking area is at the top enclosed with vertical louvers. Cantilevered verandas and a swimming pool extend towards the view to the south. The project site is located on a hillside with a steep drop down from road level. Aside from the challenge, the topography affords panoramic views to the sea.
The central concept is the configuration of spaces vertically, taking advantage of the morphology of the site for access, privacy and views. Car access and parking is from street level, with the house unraveling in three levels below, with privacy increasing towards the bottom.
The kitchen, living and dining spaces have access to a swimming pool and terrace, both of which cantilever out of the cliff to the horizon. Secondary functions like storage and bathrooms are located at the deepest part of the plan at each level. The individual volumes of each story, the parking, the verandas and the swimming pool are outlined clearly from below, whilst from the street the residence has a discreet presence of a single story. The parking is covered but open, with vertical timber louvers for shading and security. Looking at the residence from below, the form seems even more dramatic thanks to the extensive use of fair-face concrete. Large concrete building volumes appear to float from the hill side, creating an unexpected composition that appears to defy gravity. The building is half-submerged in the earth, using the soil to further insulate the interior. The thermal mass from the cliff means the house stays cool during the summer and warm in the winter. Large south facing windows were mandatory to make the most of the views, and the use of louvers and overhangs controls passive solar gains depending on the season.
The building envelope is constructed and insulated to a high standard, to enhance the building's environmental performance, and all active systems as well as lighting and appliances used were selected for their efficiency.
The property has Title Deeds
Tala Village is about 8 kilometres north of Paphos. In the Northeast of the village is the Agios Neophytos monastery and the amphitheater . In the south of the village its' neighboring village is Emba and from there also Paphos town. Tala's first residents date back to the late 1800's with a population of only 276, in 2001 permanent residents numbered 2540. Tala has become popular with many expats due to the stunning views many of the properties there offer as well as the proximity to Paphos town. It is really a prime location as all areas of Paphos are easily accessed from Tala.

property_title: Detached Villa FOR SALE in Paphos, Pegia - Sea Caves
property_description: The development was designed so it would complement and be complemented by the immediate surroundings. The development is at the top of a small canyon with one of the properties accessed via a road that leads down into the canyon to a lower-level plot. The area is mainly scrub, grassland and trees with areas of open cream or white limestone. The development follows the pattern of the landscape in being planted with mature trees and with a garden that blends with the natural vegetation. The soft natural colours of the exterior, highlighted and yet softened by the use of terracotta screens and natural wood panelling lead seamlessly into the interior living space and transition through a spacious outdoor living area. The exterior colour scheme and use of wood is continued inside with soft sand-coloured walls and ceilings highlighted with walnut doors and soft, warm downlighters that are unobtrusive yet effective in producing a homely feel during the winter nights. Internally, the feeling of luxury is highlighted with travertine marble panels used in the bathrooms and as a headboard for the bedrooms. As well as being a luxurious touch, marble is renowned for its cool touch and helps reduce the temperature as you sleep. Walnut finish doors are fitted to each room as well as the closets. In places, walnut panelling is added as a feature and adds to the feel of bringing the outside in, mirroring the exterior finishing touches. High-quality marble tiles adorn the floor throughout the properties whilst Italian-designed and manufactured ceramic tiles are used above the granite work surfaces in the kitchen, in complementary shades. The kitchen is fitted with high-spec cabinets and electrical appliances from top European manufacturers. Finally, the landscaping of the project has been carefully considered so the mature tree planting is in tune with the naturally occurring greenery. Smaller shrubs also reflect the environment, chosen from species endemic to Cyprus. For ease of maintenance, an automatic watering system is in place and for sustainability, a lining and gravel cover the ground to reduce water loss through evaporation.

property_title: Detached Villa FOR SALE in Limassol, Agios Tychonas
property_description: A new project of two luxurious villas, situated in the prestigious Agios Tychonas area of Limassol, with equally easy access to the beach and the city centre. Located on the top of the hill, it offers a magnificent view of Agios Tychonas village and the surrounding mountainous areas, and the sea. Due to its uneven surface and the fact that the architect did not want to intervene with nature, the project is designed as an integral part of the landscape. What is more, the design concept has an additional detail, which makes this project unique and extraordinary. The huge basement for each building is built within the rock formation of the land. Fully equipped parking for 6-8 cars has been implemented at this level. Open plan, fully equipped GYM full of modern equipment and floor soundproofing it is the perfect escape for a personal workout. An additional luxury to this GYM is the comfortable SPA, which includes a sauna room, a Jacuzzi, and a Hammam bath for relaxation and wellness. A unique feature at this level of the house is the emergency/panic room. A strongly protected room constructed for shelter from natural disasters such as earthquakes or other threats. Entering the ground floor, one is welcomed by a modern, minimalistic open space, which comprises the living, dining, and kitchen area. All areas open up through glass doors to the veranda, offering an abundance of openness. The entire ground floor follows an earth tone color palette, combining a variety of textures and adorned with Italian marble floors and walls. Accessible via staircase or lift, the first floor consists of four en suite bedrooms. All rooms are bright, airy, and sun-filled as they have large ceiling-to-floor glass doors, which offer a breathtaking view. Upon need, lavish long curtains and blackout screens can turn these rooms into total darkness. Both villas include landscaped gardens and covered verandas, while the 6-bedroom properties also have heated 20-meter-long swimming pools ready for training all year. Combining modern architectural lines with premium finishes and luxurious natural materials, it provides an idyllic setting for serene Mediterranean living. The private roof garden is 265 square meters.

property_title: Detached Villa FOR SALE in Paphos, Kouklia - Aphrodite Hills
property_description:
This fantastic villa is located on the Western Plateau, within walking distance to the village square facilities and offers complete privacy and peace of mind. Upon entering the villa, one will notice the harmonious colours that blend from the flooring and wall finishes to the very high-end Italian Design Kitchen cupboards. The lounge area offers a very high wooden beam ceiling and a large fireplace for those warm cosy evenings during the winter period. A second lounge can be found for everyday living with fantastic views over the large swimming pool and towards the magnificently designed gardens of the villa. The property offers 4 spacious bedrooms and 4 bathrooms with a fifth room that has been converted into an office but can be utilized as a smaller bedroom. The dining area can be located right next to the superbly designed kitchen which has been fitted with modern name brand appliances. Upon exiting the villa, one will notice a detached entertainment room to the left of the large swimming pool, offering a full size billiards table and plenty space for one to include a bar for those who want to socialise with the full experience of a sports bar. To the right of the swimming pool on the very edge of the garden, one may enjoy complete serenity with their own private jacuzzi, with amazing views over the golf course below and towards the Blue Mediterranean Sea. What makes this beautiful villa stand out, is its very spacious gardens, that have been designed to the very highest standards, offering unique colourful plants and shrubs with mature trees that have been trimmed and shaped to catch the eye. Truly one of the most beautiful gardens one can experience on the resort.
Aphrodite Hills is a coastal resort in the Paphos district, Cyprus. It is named after the goddess Aphrodite and the resort is only one mile away from Aphrodite's Rock. The resort is built on two elevated plateaus divided by a natural ravine. The resort has many features of a Mediterranean town. Greco-Roman architecture dominates, locally quarried stone is used in buildings and the town square has a market, restaurants, souvenir shops, a chapel, fragrant gardens, splashing fountains and an art gallery. The resort also has a spa, golf course, and leisure facilities. Aphrodite Hills has received two international listings in 2010. The Intercontinental Aphrodite Hills Resort Hotel and The Retreat spa were both listed in Conde Nast Travellers' Gold Lists for 2010. The Retreat Spa was named third best Hotel Spa in Europe, Asia Minor and the Russian Federation, at the Condé Nast Traveller Readers' Spa Awards and was also listed in the publication's 2010 Gold List for the Best Spas

property_title: Detached Villa FOR SALE in Paphos, Kouklia - Aphrodite Hills
property_description: This is a totally unique opportunity to purchase what is undoubtedly one of the finest properties on the whole of Aphrodite Hills, which backs directly onto the 4th Fairway of the Aphrodite Hills PGA Golf Course. This magnificent Villa was constructed on a double plot in 2008 and is approached via a spacious, gated driveway set in beautiful gardens, and right from the outset one is totally encapsulated by its sheer beauty. Upon entering the villa you are greeted with the bright, stylish dining room with concertina doors that run the length of the room, offering an instant, beautiful view out to the wonderful outside terrace, pool, garden and golf course beyond. The glass dining room sits between the main living area & kitchen/diner, and the first of the five luxurious bedrooms. The open plan living area and kitchen/diner is both modern, inviting and comfortable; with a floating kitchen bar and stools, this area is the social hub of the ground floor. There is a second side kitchen with its own sink, two dishwashers and second fridge/freezer – making entertaining even easier. This whole room also overlooks the outside area, with large patio doors that provide plenty of natural light and beautiful views. The Villa’s large outside space is well thought out, beautifully landscaped and boasts the best private pool on the resort – an impressive 25 x 5 metre pool with roman steps entrance to one end, and marble bar stools to the other. Outside areas do not come better – as well as the pool you will find a large jacuzzi, a large astro turfed lawn (with views on to the golf course) perfect for sunbathing, a stylish dining area set by the pool perfect for enjoying al fresco meals, a built in gas BBQ, and a shaded terrace with plenty of seating areas to make the most of. The jacuzzi has its own sound system (that you can connect to your phone, and radio stations) that provides the outside area with music. The space and facilities have been perfectly designed to keep everyone entertained and happy all year round in the Cyprus tradition. The ground floor double room also has patio doors which offer views over the pool and garden, continuing the light atmosphere throughout the whole level. This room benefits from having a large screen TV, ceiling fan, a walk through wardrobe space with large mirrors lead into the room’s en-suite bathroom which boasts a large walk-in shower. Also on the same floor, but with its own separate entrance from the main villa, is the second double bedroom; this can be accessed by a separate front door, or via the outside terrace patio doors to the rear. This self-contained double room also has plenty of wardrobe space, a TV, ceiling fan and en-suite bathroom with bath and overhead shower. Stairs from the ground floor lead up to the stunning first floor seating area. The height of opulence, this room is dressed in marble, and is beautifully decorated and, thankfully, with no sign of a TV – this area is meant for pure relaxation, and for soaking up the views that spill into the room through the full length concertina doors that open up the whole room and give it the impression of basking in an outside terrace. This area is perfect for letting go of all the stresses of life with a good book, escaping the rest of the family while they make use of the fantastic outside space, or enjoying a glass of champagne as the sun sets, and the garden lights up. The impressive master bedroom is set to one side of this sitting area: with a separate walk-in wardrobe with full length mirror doors; a separate en-suite with a large walk-in shower, his and hers sinks; a private balcony which overlooks the pool and garden; patio doors that offer views over the pool and garden. The last two bedrooms, one double and one twin, are set off to the other side of the sitting area: a lockable door means that they can be treated as their own annex. The twin room has two interconnecting doors to the double room, and the rooms share a bathroom with a large walk-in shower. Both rooms have patio doors that open out to offer views over the pool and garden and have large screen TVs. The beautiful double room also benefits from having a ceiling fan. Venture up one more floor and you will find the spacious top floor outside terrace which offers the same wonderful view of the pool, garden, golf course and mountains but from a higher perspective and more peaceful outlook. The interior of the property is fully air-conditioned throughout with ceiling fans, and there is underfloor heating for all year round comfort.

property_title: Detached Villa FOR SALE in Paphos, Kouklia - Aphrodite Hills
property_description: Inspired by contemporary Balinese architecture, villa is situated in one of the most sought after front-line locations in the world famous 5 Star, Aphrodite Hills Resort. With its panoramic stunning sea and sunset views and uninterrupted views across the resort, this property is one of the finest residences on Aphrodite Hills and surely one of the most unique homes in the Island. As one enters the Villa through its 3.5 metre height Iroko wood doors into an elevated entrance with its beautiful Italian Travertine stone walls, one immediately sees the Villa in all its beautiful splendour.  There are eight separate water features that beautifully blend the internal and external spaces with a sense of calmness. The two master bedrooms on the first floor have floor to ceiling bi-fold windows which allow for stunning panoramic views. The en-suite bathrooms have slate floors and marble walls and an indoor/outdoor walk-in rain shower with teak floor. The villa boasts an 11-metre-high central atrium, adding to its feeling of space and natural light. On the ground floor is a spacious sunken living and dining area, beautiful study with full sea views and stunning modern open plan fitted kitchen with a central island work station. A TV den with fireplace and guest cloakroom are also on this level. Underfloor heating and VRV air conditioning system throughout.  Down the beautifully crafted floating staircase, you have a further two double bedrooms and a separate studio apartment. The ample living space is currently a cinema room, with adjacent wine cellar and Gym room. The magnificent 20 metre lap pool offers a tranquil haven, with its pool side sunroom.

property_title: Detached Villa FOR SALE in Paphos, Pegia - Coral Bay
property_description: Exclusive custom-designed villa, built to the highest standards, guaranteeing maximal comfort and luxury living. Stunning panoramic views are delivered in the comfort of this beautiful privately gated home. Perched on a hill, you have a bird’s eye view, stretching from all along the coast of Paphos to Akamas Bay. Each room delivers a view where you can take in the beautiful surroundings and sea views! This villa features 6 bedrooms plus an office/cinema room, 9 bathrooms, large spacious two living areas, and two dining areas in a 730sq.m internal living space. Offering you luxurious natural finishes throughout: top-spec tiles, worktops, bespoke kitchen, elevator, false ceilings, and much more. The home flows beautifully on 3 levels allowing for the seamless transition between the indoors & outside. The Master Suite is spacious and flows into the dreamy master bathroom hosting decadent extras such as double sinks and a walk-in shower! The master suite enjoys a walk-in closet and of course those breathtaking views. A stunning, large outdoor entertaining area treats you to a pool, BBQ, and outdoor shower. The mountain slope elevation of the plot has inspired this unique architectural concept. The design approach is focused on utilizing the two main characteristics of the site which are the wide-angle sea view and the naturally elevated terrain. The villa is positioned into the hilly site, blending with the natural landscape while its distinctive roof line visually extends the organic geometry of the landscape linking it to the waves of the bay ahead. The villa is structurally hinged into the rocky mountain allowing for the entire facade to be fully cantilevered towards the view. The resulting image of the hovering fully glazed facade, combined with the roof curves created a unique architectural statement of lightness and natural elegance. The entry atrium is designed to provide views of the coastline in front of the plot, forever altering its core appearance to match the surrounding bay and amazing views. The villa provides a large number of features that enhance its luxurious status and privacy. The access is controlled by two gated entrances, one entrance includes a water feature with jets positioned on both sides of the bridge that spans the distance between the garden and the entrance patio. The landscape design preserves most of the natural grey rock slope and is further enhanced with the use of boulder walls using identical display walls, an internal garden feature, wine cava, and a bar. The villa includes a contemporary design lift, a sauna, a home cinema/office space, and maids' quarters. The glazing system used allows for frameless glass corners that enable unobstructed views while maintaining the thermal and soundproofing of the internal areas. The whole of the ground floor and externally accessible entry openings at the 1st and 2nd floors are fitted with concealed r/c security shutters. The top floor and all externally accessible entry openings at the 1st and 2nd floors are fitted with concealed r/c security shutters. The top-floor bedroom ceilings are designed to provide a loft character, with a variable 4-meter average height and fully glazed upper windows. The spacious 6-bedroom plus office suite villa also provides the option of an entirely separated guest suite. The villa incorporates a 5KW photovoltaic system, concealed hoover system, concealed air conditioning, and an underfloor heating system.

property_title: Detached Villa FOR SALE in Paphos, Kouklia - Aphrodite Hills
property_description: This six bedroomed villa has simply everything, and sits in breathtaking surroundings with sea and golf course views in a quiet cul de sac on the Eastern Plateau. As one enters by the large elegant electric gates, you enter the large driveway which turns and leads down to the house forming a highly impressive entrance to Villa. Villa is beautifully designed, the outside area is vast, and offers fantastic golf and sea views that surround the villa, and the fittings and layout of the interiors make for a wonderful living space. Complimenting the stunning decor are the high ceilings and carefully designed lighting that offers a welcoming ambience, and every detail, from little to large, has been thoughtfully designed to ensure that owners will enjoy every aspect of the property and its location. The villa boasts six ensuite bedrooms, a ground floor living area, dining area and kitchen, basement level bar and living area, a gym, steam room, massage room and outside space with private pool, hot tub, BBQ area and pretty, lawned gardens. There is a spacious terrace facing down the ravine with magnificent views of the Mediterranean Sea – this view that can be enjoyed from the majority of rooms inside too. There is a 13 x 4.5 m private pool (with heating) that has submerged bar stools, and there is a sunken hot tub. There is a great barbeque area with a large gas BBQ and kitchen area – including dishwasher and ice machine:  the perfect outdoor facilities to enjoy poolside al fresco dining with your friends and family. There is also a lovely lawned garden area, deliberately placed to face both sunrise and sunset – which is great for some outdoor yoga. The sound system in the villa reaches the outside terrace, so that you can listen to your favourite music in the Cypriot sunshine. The interiors have been designed with a mixture of glass and wooden features, high-raise ceilings and beautiful lighting features, creating a wonderful inside living space. The living area is open-plan and has a fireplace and large patio doors that open out to the pool terrace, bringing those magnificent views indoors. The dining area is next to the living area and leads on to the bright, modern kitchen that also faces the pool, making it a great social space that can be accessed from both the terrace and the BBQ area – so food preparation is straight forward and fun. The ground floor hosts two bedrooms, each with large modern en-suite bathrooms with showers. Both bedrooms open out onto the poolside terrace. The highlight of the villa is found downstairs! This super cool basement level is bright and open, and has a living area with a bar. This is also where you will find the gym, massage room, steam room, separate shower space, and a further two ensuite bedrooms (each bathroom with a modern shower ensuite). The gym and living space on this level open up to the lower outside terrace. Upstairs on the first floor, the bedrooms are incredible. First up is the huge master double bedroom, with en-suite bathroom that has a separate bath and shower unit. The bath offers a heavenly experience, with views from the large window that overlook the ravine and sea views. The second double room on this level also has an en-suite bathroom with separate bath (also with golf and sea views) and shower unit. The villa is also well fitted on a practical level – there is a laundry unit with washing machine and tumble dryer, high speed wi-fi throughout (internally and around the pool area for all portable devices), it has modern security, is air-conditioned throughout, has a fireplace in the living area, underfloor heating on the ground and first floor, and has central heating.

Villa Pietra is an architectural marvel that pays homage to the grandeur of Cypriot tradition while transcending into the epitome of modern luxury. Spanning a colossal 950 square meters across three levels, this villa is a commanding presence. A harmonious blend of timeless design and cutting-edge construction techniques, Villa Pietra is a true testament to timeless elegance nestled amongst natural beauty. Its exterior is a visual feast, showcasing the elegance of 52cm solid stone insulated brick and mortar walls. This isn’t just a nod to Cypriot tradition; it’s an elevation of it to unprecedented heights of opulence. The enduring appeal of solid stone, a staple in traditional Cypriot architecture, is seamlessly woven into the fabric of Villa Pietra, notmerely as a structural choice but as a testament to its commitment toauthenticity and luxury. The meticulous attention to detail is evident in every corner, from the intricately crafted stonework to the robust C40 Grade Steel Reinforced concrete foundation. These elements
